alert.note: Alert for Edgefield; McCormick (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:54PM EDT until September 07 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL MCDUFFIE...NORTHWESTERN COLUMBIA...SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN...SOUTHWESTERN EDGEFIELD AND SOUTHEASTERN MCCORMICK COUNTIES... At 354 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mistletoe State Park, or 13 miles northwest of Evans, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Mistletoe State Park, Appling, Hamilton Branch State Park, Clarks Hill Recreation Area, J. Strom Thurmond Dam, Leah, Winfield, Modoc, Scott`s Landing, Knox Scout Reservation, Phinizy, Modoc Campground, Double Branches, Columbia County Jail, Wildwood Park, Modoc Boat Ramp, Pollards Corner, Eubank-Blanchard Community Center, Lake Springs Recreation Area, and Bussey Point Campground. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
